title: FINAL BONDAGE AUDITION: THEY'LL DO ANYTHING TO GET THE PART
description: "A seven day all expense paid trip to a Tropical Paradise as part of a Movie Audition? She couldn't say no to that . . . nor could the other eleven Girls who were in competition for the same part . . .The Director had some very strict and unique ideas about his Auditions and Movies. Everyone and everything was as real as possible . . . no stunt doubles . . . the Damsel in Distress Scenes were as real as the Iron Shackles, whips, pain and Danger. His Auditions were onsite and in full costumes . . . that's why they were on this Island.There were as many Rich and Eccentric Producers watching the Auditions, as there were Girls fighting for the Part. As each day went by there were less Girls left to compete . . . which was good. It was too late when she realized as the Girls were leaving, so were the Millionaire or Billionaire Producers . . . as the numbers of Yachts, Sea Planes and Limos also decreased after every day and every Audtion . . .If everything she thought was happening was true . . . her only option was to Win the Part with hopes that meant she'd also Win Olivia . . . the only Female Producer in the group."Love Contains Scenes of, but not limited to - Bondage, Submission, Iron Shackles, More Bondage, Distress, Tease & Denial, Kidnapping, Sensory Deprivation, Spanking, Whipping, Pain, Pleasure, . . . Oh, and Lesbian Romance ; )
author: Zatanna Dark
